title: Amazon rolls out model 'smart' homes with Alexa
text:
Amazon rolls out model 'smart' homes with Alexa 9:03am EDT - 01:42
Amazon.com Inc on Wednesday said it has set up model ''smart'' homes across the U.S. for shoppers to experience what it's like for voice aide Alexa to dim the lights, turn on the TV or order more laundry detergent.
